altername_name: ROM^2 Karaoke Vol. 1: Suteki ni Standard
name: Rom Rom Karaoke: Volume 1: Suteki ni Standard
overview: ROM² Karaoke Vol. 1: Suteki ni Standard is the first in the series of karaoke discs by Victor Musical Industries. Songs are played on different backgrounds, some of which display digitized photos, while others feature hand-drawn graphics. Backgrounds may dynamically change with the song. This volume includes the following songs: Refrain ga Sakenderu Sweet Dreams Dandelion Anniversary Mamotte Agenai Sayonara Baby Itoshi no Ellie Katte ni Sindbad Miss Brand-New Day Minna no Uta In addition, this volume includes three mini-games: Bingo, a simple luck-depending lottery draw; Shinkei Suijaku, in which the player has to match pairs of tiles; and Cockroach, a top-down arcade-style game for up to four players.
